mapper.insert: insert into orderReq(item_code, item_name, count, category, area) values(#{item_code}, #{item_name}, #{count}, #{category}, #{area})
mapper.update: update p2_item set count = count + #{count} where item_code = #{item_code} and area = #{area}
mapper.delete: delete from orderReq where item_code = #{item_code} and area = #{area}
